summary: This bill, the Health Professionals Scholarship Program Improvement Act of 2025, aims to improve the Health Professionals Scholarship Program (HPSP) for veterans. It mandates that within 90 days of a participant's course completion, the Secretary of Veterans Affairs must offer a contract for full-time clinical practice at a VA facility with the highest need. The bill also requires the Secretary to submit reports to the House and Senate Veterans' Affairs Committees on the implementation of this new rule, with a termination date of September 30, 2027.
